ul.li: You have downloaded Katalon Runtime Engine.

conbody.p: To activate your Katalon Runtime Engine license with a License Server, do as follows:

li.p: Navigate to where the Katalon Runtime Engine application is located. Right-click on the application and choose Show Package Contents.
Go to Contents > Eclipse > jre > katalonc.ini.
In the katalonc.ini file, add this parameter: -DtestOps.serverUrl=<license server URL>
You only need to add this parameter once, then your Katalon Runtime Engine license is activated.
